partners_desc: Strategic partners accompanying our industrial development mission
latest_news_desc: Industrial news and FREMIN activities at a glance
supported_companies_desc: Tailor-made support for the upgrading and performance of your company
management_committee_desc: FREMIN relies on a multidisciplinary team composed of experienced professionals, committed to supporting Ivorian industrial companies.
testimonials_desc: Discover the success stories of companies supported by FREMIN
more_info_contact_text: Our experts are at your disposal to guide you through your upgrading process.
legal_framework_text_1: FREMIN is governed by a set of legislative and regulatory texts that define its scope of action and prerogatives.
legal_framework_text_2: These foundations ensure the sustainability and efficiency of our interventions with the private sector.
missions_intro: In accordance with its creating decree, FREMIN's missions are as follows:
mission_item_1: the financing of support for companies through direct aid and bonuses;
mission_item_2: guarantees to be granted to banks to facilitate company access to financing for their physical investments intended for the renovation and modernization of their production tools, the extension of their production infrastructure, and their activities, in sectors considered priority in view of national industrial policy;
mission_item_3: financial support for local technical laboratories as well as accreditation and standardization structures for the reinforcement of their capacities;
mission_item_4: the financing of support centers for competitiveness and industrial development;
mission_item_5: Any other intervention that contributes to the achievement of the Government's objectives regarding the competitiveness of industrial manufacturing companies.

activities_desc: Discover the initiatives and highlights of FREMIN's actions.
aed_program: Direct Support to Companies in Difficulty (AED)
